title: When you see your ally dying on the other side of a wall, but you have no mobility to reach them

replies.body: *shamelessly  begans to back and prepare to defend base*
Where are all the ? pings from your teammate who's mad at you for not helping?

Don't you just _love_ it when you're team decides to leave you & fight on another planet while you're busy trying to survive {{champion:238}} &{{champion:107}}. Only for them to ? spam you & ask "where the fuck were you?" while you're backing to base.
I've had fun experiences trying to fight {{champion:238}} +{{champion:107}} as {{champion:33}}. I had to chase the bastards down to make them fight me.

And then your teamate flames you for not helping
https://i.imgflip.com/tdfqe.jpg?a430848
When the adc goes over a wall but your an immobile support
GOOD GOD, Les Misérables flashbacks. I didn't need to be reminded of singing Russel Crow.
Ayyy so that's where this gif is from. It all makes sense now
As a Morde main, this hits home.
You usually mute them as they will probably flame you afterwards as they expect you to have 3 flashes off cool down.

We need one from pirates of the caribbean, the one where Will and Elizabeth right in the middle of a fight decide they want Barbarossa to preside over their marriage right then and there and he is like " I am a little busy at the moment!"

Excellent representation of when you are right down in the middle of a fight and at least one teammate starts pinging you for not rushing to help them when they die nearby x)
